## ğŸŒŸ ROT CRACK
Code implemented in Rust to solve encrypted messages from Kevin Mitnick's book GHOST IN THE WIRES, 
where the ROTx encryption method is used.


## ğŸ“¦ Requirements 

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/)

## ğŸš€ Run the program

```bash
cargo run
```
